name: Combiform: A Revolutionary Console for Social Gaming
blurb: The next generation open source, combinable game platform that's PORTABLE, inexpensive and also can be used on the TV anytime you want!

rewards.reward: Tell us your game idea (via comment) and we will post it on our site with your name on it. The best 3 game ideas that we picked will receive a free complete Combiform platform (4 controllers). Included also, the Combiform @SIGGRAPH 2012 poster in digital form. \r\nThank you so much for your support!
Exclusive Combiform Controllers Design Booklet in digital form. It captures many unreleased versions of Combiform drawings, including the prototype lasercutting CAD files. (plus the rewards above)

Early Bird Special! - \r\nYou will get the production model at least 2 weeks in advance, before everyone else. A retail BASIC package of Combiform. Comes with a full set of 4(FOUR!) controllers along with 3 games of your choice + SDK library for developing your own games.   (add $29 for optional VGA converter and cable)(add $20 for international shipping)

retail BASIC - \r\nA full set of 4(FOUR!) Combiform controllers along with 2 games of your choice + SDK library for developing your own games. (add $29 for optional VGA converter and cable) (add $20 for international shipping)

retail PLUS - \r\nA full set of 4(FOUR!) Combiform controllers along with 10 games of your choice + SDK library for developing your own games + HDMI converter and cable. (add $20 for international shipping)
The Social Animal - \r\nTwo full sets of the BASIC package. Great for large families. (add $58 for optional 2 VGA converters and 2 cables). (add $30 for international shipping)
The Party Animal - \r\nFour full sets of the BASIC package. Invite the entire block over. (add $116 for optional 4 VGA converters and cables). (add $50 for international shipping)

The Inventor's Touch - \r\nThe iconic working prototype, alpha 0.5.2. hand-crafted by the inventor of Combiform with your name engraved on it. This will also include the $139 retail PLUS package with a lifetime warranty. (A choice of limited BLACK edition controllers)

Be the Boss - We will have our team work with you to create your own mini game. You will be credited as Lead Designer on the game. We will also give you 2 sets of $139 retail PLUS package with lifetime warranty. (A choice of limited BLACK edition controllers)

HANG OUT WITH COMBIFORM - \r\nWe will fly you to Los Angeles, California to experience playing Combiform with our development team for the day in Hollywood, dinner included. The entire first line of production will also have your name engraved on it credited as Executive Producer. Included are the iconic state of the art handmade prototype (alpha 0.5.2) and 3 sets of retail PLUS package with lifetime warranty. A set each for your family, friends, and yourself. Keep your scouter on lookout, because a special someone just might show up. ;D (Continental US residents only!) (A choice of limited BLACK edition controllers)
